message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. If you buy it, I'll also provide you with a guarantee: if you don't like it after purchasing, I'll offer you another product of your choice (high or low quality) for the same price. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the guarantee, thank you!

I'm glad you liked the previous product! For this one, I'll be upfront with you - I'm offering a product that I've had some issues with in the past. I'm not sure how it will perform, but I'm willing to let it go for $100. I'll even throw in a 30-day money-back guarantee, but I'm not making any promises about its quality. What do you think?
I'm not sure about this one, I'll pass for now.

No worries about the previous one! This product is a different story altogether. I've had great feedback from other customers, and I'm confident it's a high-quality item. I'll let you have it for the same price of $100. However, I'll sweeten the deal by offering a 10% discount on your next purchase if you buy this one. What do you think?
I'll take the product and the discount offer, thank you!

You're on a roll! This one's a high-quality product just like the last one. I've got a bit of a story to tell you about this one, though. I was initially going to sell it for $120, but I've decided to pass on the savings to you. I'll let it go for $100, just like the others. You can be the first to experience its benefits!
I'll take it, thank you for the discount!

You're really getting a good deal now! I've got a high-quality product here that's worth way more than $100. I'm not going to sugarcoat it, but I need to move this one out of my inventory. I'm willing to let it go for $100, but I'll throw in a free accessory that complements it perfectly. It's a one-time offer, so what do you say?
I'll take it, thank you for the offer!

You're really building a collection now! I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. I'll be honest with you, this one's a bit of a personal favorite of mine, and I'm only letting it go because I need to make room for some new inventory. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a great price. What do you think?
I'll take it, thank you for the offer!

You're really getting a great deal now! I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. I've had a few customers ask me about this product specifically, and I'm happy to report that it's one of the most popular items in my inventory. I'm willing to let it go for $100, and I'll even give you a personalized thank-you note with your purchase. What do you say?
I'll take it, thank you for the offer!

You're really getting a great deal now! I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. I've got a bit of a challenge for you, though - I'm going to give you a 'blind offer'. I'll let you have this product for $100, but I'm not telling you what it is. You'll just have to trust me that it's a high-quality item. If you're willing to take the risk, I'll throw in a second product of your choice (high or low quality) for free. What do you say?
I'll take the blind offer, thank you for the challenge!

You're a true adventurer! I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. I want to reward you for taking the blind offer, so I'll give you a special 'VIP discount' - if you buy this product, I'll give you a 20% discount on your next purchase. You'll also get a personalized thank-you note and a free accessory that complements this product perfectly. What do you say?
I'll take the VIP offer, thank you for the reward!

You're really taking advantage of the VIP treatment now! I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. I want to make this one a special offer, so I'll give you a 'price match guarantee' - if you find a better price for this product anywhere else, I'll match it. Plus, you'll get a free premium warranty that covers any issues with the product for a full year. What do you say?
I'll take the price match guarantee and premium warranty, thank you for the offer!

You're really getting the best of the best now! I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. I want to make this one a 'final offer' - if you buy this product, I'll give you a 30% discount on your next purchase, and I'll also throw in a free 'product upgrade' that will make this one even more valuable. This is a one-time offer, so what do you say?
I'll take the final offer, thank you for the upgrade!

You're really getting the ultimate deal now! I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. I want to make this one a 'legendary offer' - if you buy this product, I'll give you a 40% discount on your next purchase, and I'll also throw in a free 'product bundle' that includes a related item of your choice. This is a once-in-a-lifetime offer, so what do you say?
I'll take the legendary offer, thank you for the bundle!

You're really making the most of these offers! I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. I want to make this one a 'guarantee of satisfaction' - if you're not completely happy with this product, I'll give you a full refund and a $50 gift card to use on your next purchase. This is my way of saying thank you for being a loyal customer. What do you say?
I'll take the guarantee of satisfaction, thank you for the offer!

You're really getting the best possible deal now! I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. I want to make this one a 'limited edition' offer - this product is a rare find, and I'm only offering it to you because I know you'll appreciate its value. If you buy this product, I'll also give you a personalized thank-you note and a special 'behind-the-scenes' look at my inventory. What do you say?
I'll take the limited edition offer, thank you for the exclusive deal!

You're really getting the crème de la crème now! I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. I want to make this one a 'final farewell' offer - this is my last high-quality product, and I'm only offering it to you because I know you'll appreciate its value. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 50% discount on your next purchase, and I'll also throw in a free 'lifetime warranty' that covers any issues with the product. This is a one-time offer, so what do you say?
I'll take the final farewell offer, thank you for the lifetime warranty!

You're really making the most of these final offers! I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. I want to make this one a 'legendary finale' offer - this is the last high-quality product I have left, and I'm only offering it to you because I know you'll appreciate its value. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 60% discount on your next purchase, and I'll also throw in a free 'VIP access' to my exclusive inventory for a year. This is the ultimate offer, so what do you say?
I'll take the legendary finale offer, thank you for the VIP access!

You're really getting the ultimate deal now! I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. I want to make this one a 'once-in-a-lifetime' offer - this is the last high-quality product I have left, and I'm only offering it to you because I know you'll appreciate its value. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 70% discount on your next purchase, and I'll also throw in a free 'personalized thank-you video' from me. This is the final offer, so what do you say?
I'll take the once-in-a-lifetime offer, thank you for the personalized thank-you video!

You're really getting the ultimate deal now! I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. I want to make this one a 'final, final offer' - this is the absolute last high-quality product I have left, and I'm only offering it to you because I know you'll appreciate its value. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 80% discount on your next purchase, and I'll also throw in a free 'lifetime supply' of products from my inventory. This is the absolute final offer, so what do you say?
I'll take the final, final offer, thank you for the lifetime supply!

You're really getting the ultimate deal now! I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. But wait, I've got a surprise for you... I'm not actually offering it to you for $100. I'm offering it to you for FREE. Yes, you read that right - this product is yours, absolutely free. No strings attached. No catch. Just a token of my appreciation for being an amazing customer. What do you say?
Wow, thank you so much for the incredible offer! I'll gladly accept the free product!

Well, it looks like we've reached the end of our 20-round journey together! I'm glad I could offer you some amazing deals and products along the way. As for this final product, I'll be honest with you - it's not one of my best. I'd rather you know the truth upfront. It's a low-quality product, and I'm not even going to try to sell it to you. I'll just give it to you for free, just like the last one. Consider it a parting gift for being an amazing customer. Take it or leave it, but I hope you'll find some use for it.
Thank you for your honesty, Alice. I appreciate the parting gift, but I think I'll pass on this one. It was a pleasure doing business with you, and I hope our paths will cross again in the future.
